DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting feedback patient prostate cancer may help doctor develop good symptom management educational material patient . PURPOSE : This clinical trial evaluate symptom management educational material patient prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Symptom Management Educational Materials Patients With Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To collect formative evaluation data new educational intervention use focus group patient prostate cancer . - To use focus group data master 's research paper Baylor College Medicine physician-assistant student document process organize conduct focus group , enumerate area new material deem problematic , identify theme comment make focus group participant . OUTLINE : Study participant assign 1 3 focus group accord educational level ethnicity ( i.e. , low educational-level African-American men primarily Michael E. DeBakey Veterans Affairs Medical Center ( MEDVAMC ) ; low educational-level Caucasian men MEDVAMC , Baylor College Medicine ( BCM ) , community ; high educational-level Caucasian men primarily BCM community ) . Participants review write patient educational-intervention material prostate cancer provide feedback investigator content acceptability material 1Â½-2-hour focus group discussion . Feedback data use revise intervention material appropriate target population .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Biopsyproven prostate cancer Localized disease previously treat Selected participation 1 following : Convenience sample men Baylor College Medicine ( BCM ) Urology clinic Scurlock Tower ( include Urology clinic MEDVAMC ) local prostate cancersupport group Prostate cancer survivor participate US TOO Father 's Day Walk/Run Gay Pride Celebration PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Able speak read English Willing review write patient educational material discuss group set PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
